plot: It's a show about the most successful singles and albums out of the official German charts. The series starts with the most successful singles, other episodes were for example about the most successful sommerhits and movie-songs.
plot_en: It's a show about the most successful singles and albums out of the official German charts. The series starts with the most successful singles, other episodes were for example about the most successful sommerhits and movie-songs.
plot_es: It's a show about the most successful singles and albums out of the official German charts. The series starts with the most successful singles, other episodes were for example about the most successful sommerhits and movie-songs.
title: Die ultimative Chartshow
